name: TronzBank
description:
TronzBank, Fully-Decentralized Privacy Wallet on Tron Network, shields your transfers based on Zero-knowledge Proof and Tronz Protocol. Tronz Protocol is the official-supported privacy protocol of Tron Network. For users, TronzBank is just like a regular wallet. Once you have put money into TronzBank, you can make shielded & secure transfers with others.
TronzBank is live on TRON Mainnet but we team hope that it can be deployed on Ethereum which need community's donates to finish it.
payDisclosure: THANKS FOR YOUR FUNDS TO MAKE PRIVACY GREAT AGAIN IN WEB3 WORLD
